description.text: The function getRegisteredClients can be used to get the list of currently registered transaction logging clients.
Die Funktion getRegisteredClients kann verwendet werden, um die Liste der aktuell registrierten Transaktionsprotokollierungs-Clients zu erhalten.

If the referencing guideline limits the access to the functionality solely to authenticated users, the function SHALL check if the user that has invoked the function has the status authenticated. If the status is not authenticated, the function SHALL raise the exception ErrorUserNotAuthenticated and exit the function.
Prüft, ob Nutzer authentifiziert. Falls nicht: Exception ErrorUserNotAuthenticated, Ende.

pseudocode.text: IF user NOT authenticated THEN THROW ErrorUserNotAuthenticated EXIT function END
WENN Benutzer NICHT authentifiziert DANN WERFE ErrorUserNotAuthenticated BEENDE_FUNKTION ENDE

description.text: If the referencing guideline limits the access to the functionality to certain roles, the function SHALL check in the corresponding role if the (unauthenticated) user is authorized to execute the function. If the user is not authorized, the function SHALL raise the exception ErrorUserNotAuthorized and exit the function.
Prüft, ob Nutzer berechtigt. Falls nicht: Exception ErrorUserNotAuthorized, Ende.

pseudocode.text: IF user NOT authorized THEN THROW ErrorUserNotAuthorized EXIT function END
WENN Benutzer NICHT autorisiert DANN WERFE ErrorUserNotAuthorized BEENDE_FUNKTION ENDE

description.text: The function SHALL determine the number of transactions that are currently opened. If the determination of this number fails, the function SHALL raise the exception ErrorGetCurrentNumberOfTransactionsFailed and exit the function.
Ermittelt offene Transaktionen. Bei Fehler: Exception ErrorGetCurrentNumberOfTransactionsFailed, Ende.

pseudocode.text: TRY DETERMINE number of currently open transactions ON ERROR THROW ErrorGetCurrentNumberOfTransactionsFailed EXIT function END
VERSUCHE ERMITTLE Anzahl aktuell offener Transaktionen BEI_FEHLER WERFE ErrorGetCurrentNumberOfTransactionsFailed BEENDE_FUNKTION ENDE

description.text: If the determination of the number of currently opened transactions is successful, the function SHALL return the number by usage of the output parameter currentNumberTransactions. Additionally, the function SHALL return without raising an exception to indicate that the execution of the function has been successful.
Gibt Anzahl zurück. Bei Erfolg keine Exception.

pseudocode.text: RETURN transaction count (currentNumberTransactions parameter) RETURN without exception
GEBE Transaktionsanzahl zurück (currentNumberTransactions Parameter) RETURN ohne Exception
